name: Need for Speed GT
overview:
Get behind the wheel of the world's top high-performance cars, including the 450-horsepower Dodge Viper GTS, the nimble Lotus Elise, the BMW Z8 and the fastest production Corvette ever made, the Z06. With a mix of high-end American muscle and top European exotics, Need For Speed GT has cars that will appeal to all players.

The sky is reflected in the surface of your car. Smoke pours from your tires when you punch it off the line. Leaves blow from trees as you rocket past. Of course, it's hard to notice these details when you're tearing down a mountain road at 160 with a Z8 2 inches from your right rear quarter panel.

Need For Speed GT features a player-selectable difficulty system that provides easier handling for beginning players and more challenging realistic driving physics for experienced drivers. The driving experience is further heightened with 6-speaker surround sound and force feedback steering. Need For Speed GT is linkable, allowing blistering head-to-head competition for up to 4 players.
